description: Andrew Phillips, Casey Williams, Jason Sizemore, and Trent Atkins are all looking to find the best fit.  The men sample a jockstrap for size, then continue with a fitting of another sort as they enjoy sizing up and settling in on their respective assets.  Join these studs as they weave themselves into a complex string of sexual abandon and surrender to their combined needs.  The unfolding action is too hot to miss!
title: Try Me On For Size, Scene #03
